abstract: A federal court’s oversight of Microsoft has been extended through January to give a judge time to consider a motion to extend that oversight for another five years.
snippet: A federal court’s oversight of Microsoft has been extended through January to give a judge time to consider a motion to extend that oversight for another five years.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 30 (Dow Jones) — A federal district court’s oversight of Microsoft has been extended until the end of January to give the judge in the case time to consider a motion to extend that oversight for another five years.

headline.main: Federal Court Extends Oversight of Microsoft Until January
headline.print_headline: Federal Court Extends Oversight of Microsoft Until January

abstract: A week after losing out to Microsoft in a bid to invest in Facebook, Google is hitting back.
lead_paragraph: A week after losing out to Microsoft in a bid to invest in Facebook, Google is hitting back.

headline.main: Google and Friends to Gang Up on Facebook
